thread.title: Priyanka Chopra Assures Fans That She Is Okay
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra Assures Fans That She Is Okay

title: Priyanka Chopra Assures Fans That She Is Okay
text:
facebook 331 SHARES 
Recently, Priyanka Chopra suffered an injury on the sets of the show, Quantico . She slipped and fell on her head, while shooting an action scene. Her spokesperson confirmed that she was rushed to the hospital, examined, and sent back. But, she has been ordered to rest for a few days, and not return to work before the weekend. 
Meanwhile, PeeCee took to Twitter to let her fans know that she will be okay. Thank you for all of your warm thoughts and well wishes.I will be ok, and am looking forward to getting back to work as soon as I can.much❤️
